info.title: Locations Inside Prison API
info.description: API for viewing and managing locations inside a prison

tags.name: Prison Configuration
tags.description: Allows views and updates on prison configuration

tags.name: Sync
tags.description: Sync NOMIS to Locations Inside Prison Service API endpoints.

tags.name: Non-residential functions
tags.description: Information in non-residential locations and CRUD operations on them

tags.name: Location Occupancy
tags.description: Returns location information with occupancy information

tags.name: Certification
tags.description: Functionality to manage certification of residential locations

tags.name: hmpps-queue-resource-async
tags.description: Endpoints that are to be used by administrators only for managing SQS queues. All endpoints require the QUEUE_ADMIN role further information can be found in the hmpps-spring-boot-sqs project

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Returns a transaction history applied to a list of locations

tags.name: Signed Operation Capacity
tags.description: Returns Signed Operation Capacity data per prison.

get.description: Returns the dataset for the given report ID and report variant ID filtered by the filters provided in the query.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
The filter query parameters have to start with the prefix "filters." followed by the name of the filter.
      For range filters, like date for instance, these need to be followed by a .start or .end suffix accordingly.
      For multiselect filters, these are passed as one query parameter per filter with a comma separated list of values:
      filters.someMultiselectFilter=a,b,c

parameters.name: dataProductDefinitionsPath
parameters.description:
This optional parameter sets the path of the directory of the data product definition files your application will use.
      "This query parameter is intended to be used in conjunction with the `dpr.lib.dataProductDefinitions.host` property to retrieve definition files from another application by using a web client.

403.description: Forbidden

x-no-data-warning.description: Provides additional information about why no data has been returned.

errorCode.description: When present, uniquely identifies the type of error making it easier for clients to discriminate without relying on error description or HTTP status code; see `uk.gov.justice.digital.hmpps.locationsinsideprison.resources.ErrorCode` enumeration in hmpps-locations-inside-prison-api

resiLocationServiceActive.description: Indicates that the residential service is active

nonResiServiceActive.description: Indicates that the non-resi service is active

includeSegregationInRollCount.description: Indicates that roll count should include segregation in its calculations for net vacancies

certificationApprovalRequired.description: Indicates that this prison must go through the certification process to create or change cells

certified.description: Indicates that this location is certified for use as a residential location

capacityOfCertifiedCell.description: Old name for CNA (Certified normal accommodation)

pathHierarchy.description: Full path of the location within the prison

localName.description: Alternative description to display for location, (Not Cells)

comments.description: Additional comments that can be made about this location

permanentlyInactive.description: Indicates if the location is permanently inactive

pendingChanges.description: Pending changes of draft or pending approval location

oldWorkingCapacity.description: When a cell is inactive, show the active working capacity value

certifiedCell.description: Indicates that this location is certified for use as a cell

certification.description: Indicates that this location is certified for use as a residential location

internalMovementAllowed.description: Indicates that this location can used for internal movements

deactivatedByParent.description: Indicates the location in inactive as a parent is deactivated

deactivationReasonDescription.description: For OTHER deactivation reason, a free text comment is provided

deactivatedBy.description: Staff username who deactivated the location

proposedReactivationDate.description: Estimated reactivation date for location reactivation

level.description: Current Level within hierarchy, starts at 1, e.g Wing = 1

leafLevel.description: Indicates this is the lowest level, often a cell

topLevelApprovalLocationId.description: Location Id where approvals can be requested, below this level approval request will not be allowed

pendingApprovalRequestId.description: Indicates that this location this one has a pending approval, the approval will be for the location held in topLevelApprovalLocationId`

lastDeactivationReasonForChange.description: Reason for the last deactivation change

inactiveCells.description: Number of inactive cells below this location

numberOfCellLocations.description: Total number of non-structural locations are below this level, e.g. cells and rooms

transactionHistory.description: A list of transactions applied to this location

lastModifiedBy.description: Staff username who last changed the location

lastModifiedDate.description: Date and time of the last change

isResidential.description: Indicates if the location is a residential location

cellMark.description: Pending cell mark of the location

txStartTime.description: Date and time the transaction started

txEndTime.description: Date and time the transaction ended

transactionDetails.description: The list of changes that were made in the transaction

TemporaryDeactivationLocationRequest.description: Request to temporarily deactivate a location, optionally indicating certification approval required

deactivationReasonDescription.description: Additional information on deactivation, for OTHER DeactivatedReason must be provided

requiresApproval.description: The deactivation needs to be approved, if false (default) it will be classed as a short term temporary deactivation

reasonForChange.description: Explanation of why the capacity need to be decreased
reasonForChange.example: The cell is damaged and will be take 6 months to repair

UpdateNonResCellTypeRequest.description: Request to update the type of a non-res cell location

otherConvertedCellType.description: When other, the cell type name

PermanentDeactivationLocationRequest.description: Request to permanently deactivate a location

ConvertToCellRequest.description: Request to convert a non-res location to a cell

ConvertCellToNonResidentialLocationReque.description: Request to convert a cell to a non-res location

UpdateLocationLocalNameRequest.description: Request to update the local name of a location

localName.description: Alternative description to display for location

updatedBy.description: Username of the staff updating the location

CellSanitationChangeRequest.description: Request change of cell sanitation and add the reason for change is certification is required

inCellSanitation.description: Whether the cell has in-cell sanitation

reasonForChange.description: The reason why the approval was requested, mandatory if the cell change must be approved

CellMarkChangeRequest.description: Request change of cell mark and add the reason for change is certification is required

reasonForChange.description: The reason why the approval was requested, mandatory if the cell change must be approved
reasonForChange.example: The door mark has been updated

CreateOrUpdateNonResidentialLocationRequ.description: Request to create or update non-residential location

localName.description: Description of the non-residential locations, mandatory for create

active.description: Status, if false will be marked as inactive, true will make active or null untouched

pathHierarchy.description: Full path of the location within the prison

permanentlyInactive.description: Indicates if the location is permanently inactive

usedByGroupedServices.description: Collections of services that use this location

deactivationReasonDescription.description: For OTHER deactivation reason, a free text comment is provided

deactivatedBy.description: Staff username who deactivated the location

level.description: Current Level within hierarchy, starts at 1, e.g Wing = 1

CellDraftUpdateRequest.description: Request to a create location and cell locations below it

prisonId.description: Prison ID where the location is situated

parentLocation.description: Parent location under which cells is to be updated, this location must be DRAFT

cellsUsedFor.description: Used for types for all cells

cells.description: Set of cells that are to be created or amended, if the location is for update then missing cells will be removed

CellInformation.description: Information about cells to be created or updated

id.description: ID of the location, update only

capacity.description: New capacity of the location, if null the old values are used

BasicTemporaryDeactivationRequest.description: Request to temporarily deactivate a location - used in bulk updates

deactivationReasonDescription.description: Additional information on deactivation, for OTHER DeactivatedReason must be provided

requiresApproval.description: The deactivation needs to be approved, if false (default) it will be classed as a short term temporary deactivation

reasonForChange.description: Explanation of why the capacity need to be decreased
reasonForChange.example: The cell is damaged and will be take 6 months to repair

updatedBy.description: Username of the user requesting to deactivate the locations, if not provided the token username or client id will be used

locations.description: List of locations to permanently deactivate

certifiedNormalAccommodation.description: Indicates the capacity of the certified location (cell)

inCellSanitation.description: Indicate that the cell as in-cell sanitation

SignedOpCapApprovalRequest.description: Request to approve a location or set of locations and cells below it

prisonId.description: The prison where the signed op cap is to be approved

signedOperationalCapacity.description: The new value of the signed operational capacity

reasonForChange.description: Explanation of why the signed op cap is changing
reasonForChange.example: The size of the prison has changed

requestedDate.description: Date and time of the request

approvedOrRejectedBy.description: User who approved or rejected the request

approvedOrRejectedDate.description: Date and time of the approval or rejection

comments.description: Comments about the approval or rejection

currentSignedOperationCapacity.description: Current value of signed operational capacity

reasonForSignedOpChange.description: The reason why the signed op cap was changed

reasonForChange.description: The reason why the approval was requested

certificateId.description: The ID of the certificate once approved

inCellSanitation.description: Whether the cell has in-cell sanitation

currentInCellSanitation.description: Whether the current cell has in-cell sanitation

deactivationReasonDescription.description: For OTHER deactivation reason, a free text comment is provided

proposedReactivationDate.description: Estimated reactivation date for location reactivation

WithdrawCertificationRequestDto.description: Request to withdraw a certification request

LocationApprovalRequest.description: Request to approve a location or set of locations and cells below it

locationId.description: Location Id of location requiring approval for being certified

RejectCertificationRequestDto.description: Request to reject a certification request

ApproveCertificationRequestDto.description: Request to approve a certification request

id.description: Location UUID, provided if already exists

prisonId.description: Prison ID where the location is situated

localName.description: Alternative description to display for location

comments.description: Additional comments that can be made about this location

orderWithinParentLocation.description: Sequence of locations within the current parent location

parentLocationPath.description: Path hierarchy of the parent (if one exists)

parentId.description: Parent UUID of the parent location (if one exists)

certifiedCell.description: Indicates that this location is certified for use as a residential location

certification.description: Deprecated mechanism for displaying and updating CNA and certified status

internalMovementAllowed.description: Indicates that this location can used for internal movements

createDate.description: Date location was created, if not provided then the current time will be used for a new location

lastModifiedDate.description: Last updated, if not provided then the current time will be used

lastUpdatedBy.description: Username of the staff updating the location

pathHierarchy.description: Full path of the location within the prison

localName.description: Alternative description to display for location, (Not Cells)

comments.description: Additional comments that can be made about this location

ignoreWorkingCapacity.description: When set to true DO NOT SYNC the working capacity

certification.description: Indicates that this location is certified for use as a residential location

internalMovementAllowed.description: Indicates that this location can used for internal movements

orderWithinParentLocation.description: Sequence of locations within the current parent location

proposedReactivationDate.description: Estimated reactivation date for location reactivation

permanentlyDeactivated.description: Indicates that this location has been permanently deactivated and should not be changed in NOMIS

prisonId.description: Prison ID where the location is situated

CellInitialisationRequest.description: Request to a create location and cell locations below it

prisonId.description: Prison ID where the location is situated

parentLocation.description: Parent location under which the structure and/or cells should be created, if not specified then will add to the top level of the prison, is specified but no `newLevelAboveCells` is specified then cells will be created under this location

newLevelAboveCells.description: The location to create above the cells, this is normally a landing or spur, if the location where cells should be created under already exists then leave null

cellsUsedFor.description: Used For Types for all cells

LevelAboveCells.description: Holds information about the level above which the cells should be created

levelCode.description: Code assigned to the new structural location

levelLocalName.description: Alternative description to display for location
